com.wiris.plugin.api

Interface ParamsProvider


  • public interface ParamsProvider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String param, java.lang.String dflt)
      Returns the parameter "param" if not exists returns "dlft" string.
      java.util.Properties getParameters()
      Returns all the parameters stored.
      java.util.Properties getRenderParameters(Configuration configuration)
      Returns all the render params stored.
      java.lang.String getRequiredParameter(java.lang.String param)
      Returns the parameter "param".
      java.util.Properties getServiceParameters()
      Returns all the service params stored.

    • Method Detail

      • getParameter

        java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String param,
                            java.lang.String dflt)
        Returns the parameter "param" if not exists returns "dlft" string.

      • getRequiredParameter

        java.lang.String getRequiredParameter(java.lang.String param)
        Returns the parameter "param". If not exists throws an Error.

      • getParameters

        Returns all the parameters stored.

        Returns all the render params stored.

        Returns all the service params stored.
